name: Baydin, Inc.
description: Developer of an e-mail productivity software designed to encourage people to be productive. The company's software analyzes the selected e-mail messages and searches across the enterprise through shared network drives and Sharepoint sites and displays related documents, enabling companies to work efficiently and save time.
